## Instructor

![](images/team/llo.png){fig-alt="Headshot of Dr. Mine Ã‡etinkaya-Rundel" style="float:right;padding: 0 0 0 10px;" width="195"}

Dr. Louis (Lou) L. Odette was most recently Head of Advanced Analytics at Greenergy Retail Canada. Prior to joining Greenery, Lou was Vice President of Quantitative Modeling & Research at AIG in Boston with responsibilities for review and validation of existing risk models and risk metrics, in addition to modeling and assessment of alternative asset class risks. He holds a PhD in Electrical Engineering from MIT and an MSc in Mathematics from Oxford University. **Spoiler alert**: the picture to the right was taken over 40 years ago.
